1 #include <akit_pick_place/akit_pick_place.h>

3 static const std::string BASE_LINK = "chassis";
4 const double CYLINDER_HEIGHT = 0.35;
5 const double CYLINDER_RADIUS = 0.175;
6 
7 double fRand(double fMin, double fMax){ //make a new random number generator
8  double f = (double)rand() / RAND_MAX;
9  return fMin + f * (fMax - fMin);
10 }
11 void generateRandomBlock(geometry_msgs::Pose& cylinder_pose)
12 {
13  // Position
14  cylinder_pose.position.x = fRand(-3.0,3.0);
15  cylinder_pose.position.y = fRand(-2.2,-3.2);
16  cylinder_pose.position.z = 0.17;
17 
18  // Orientation
19  double angle = M_PI * fRand(0.1,1);
20  Eigen::Quaterniond quat(Eigen::AngleAxis<double>(double(angle), Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ()));
21  cylinder_pose.orientation.x = quat.x();
22  cylinder_pose.orientation.y = quat.y();
23  cylinder_pose.orientation.z = quat.z();
24  cylinder_pose.orientation.w = quat.w();
25 }
26 
27 moveit_msgs::CollisionObject createCollisionCylinder(geometry_msgs::Pose cylinder_pose,
28  std::string cylinder_name, double cylinder_height, double cylinder_radius){
29  moveit_msgs::CollisionObject cylinder;
30  cylinder.id = cylinder_name;
31  cylinder.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
32  cylinder.header.frame_id = BASE_LINK;
33  shape_msgs::SolidPrimitive primitive;
34  primitive.type = primitive.CYLINDER;
35  primitive.dimensions.resize(2);
36  primitive.dimensions[0] = cylinder_height;
37  primitive.dimensions[1] = cylinder_radius;
38 
39  cylinder.primitives.push_back(primitive);
40  cylinder.primitive_poses.push_back(cylinder_pose);
41  cylinder.operation = moveit_msgs::CollisionObject::ADD;
42 
43  return cylinder;
44 }

46 int main(int argc, char**argv){
47

49  ros::AsyncSpinner spinner(1);
50  spinner.start();

52  moveit::planning_interface::PlanningSceneInterface planningSceneInterface;
53  akit_pick_place akit;
54 
55  //specify place position such that 2 cylinders above each other for 5 rows
56 
57  std::vector<geometry_msgs::Pose> place_locations_;
58  geometry_msgs::Pose placeLocation1;
59  placeLocation1.position.z = 0.17;
60  placeLocation1.position.x = 2.0;
61  placeLocation1.position.y = 3.0;
62  placeLocation1.orientation.x = placeLocation1.orientation.y = placeLocation1.orientation.z = 0.0;
63  placeLocation1.orientation.w = 1.0;
64 
65  geometry_msgs::Pose placeLocation2 = placeLocation1;

67  geometry_msgs::Pose placeLocation3 = placeLocation1;
68  placeLocation3.position.x = 0.0;
69  geometry_msgs::Pose placeLocation4 = placeLocation1;
70  placeLocation4.position.x = -1.0;
71  geometry_msgs::Pose placeLocation6 = placeLocation1;
72  placeLocation6.position.z = placeLocation1.position.z + CYLINDER_HEIGHT + 0.02;
73  ROS_INFO_STREAM(placeLocation6.position.z);
74  geometry_msgs::Pose placeLocation7 = placeLocation2;
75  placeLocation7.position.z = placeLocation2.position.z + CYLINDER_HEIGHT + 0.02;
76  geometry_msgs::Pose placeLocation8 = placeLocation3;
77  placeLocation8.position.z = placeLocation3.position.z + CYLINDER_HEIGHT + 0.02;

90 
91  //generate 10 random position cylinders
92  std::vector<moveit_msgs::CollisionObject> collisionObjects(1);
93 
94  for (int i = 0; i < place_locations_.size(); ++i){
95  geometry_msgs::Pose cylinder_pose;
96  generateRandomBlock(cylinder_pose);
97  moveit_msgs::CollisionObject cylinder = createCollisionCylinder(cylinder_pose, "cylinder" + std::to_string(i),
98  CYLINDER_HEIGHT,CYLINDER_RADIUS);
99  collisionObjects[0] = cylinder;
100  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Adding Collision object to world");
101  planningSceneInterface.addCollisionObjects(collisionObjects);
102 
103  akit.generateGrasps(cylinder_pose, CYLINDER_HEIGHT, CYLINDER_RADIUS);
104  if(!akit.pick(cylinder)){
105  ROS_ERROR("Failed to pick");
106  continue;
107  } else {
108  akit.generateGrasps(place_locations_[i], CYLINDER_HEIGHT, CYLINDER_RADIUS);
109  if (!akit.place(cylinder)){
110  ROS_ERROR("Failed to place");
111  continue;
112  }
113  }
114  }
115 
116  return 0;
117
